content: About the blog Obsidian Search Search Dark mode Light mode Reader mode !a.isFolder&&!b.isFolder||a.isFolder&&b.isFolder?a.displayName.localeCompare(b.displayName,void 0,{numeric:!0,sensitivity:\"base\"}):!a.isFolder&&b.isFolder?1:-1","filterFn":"node=>node.slugSegment!==\"tags\"","mapFn":"node=>node"}"> Explorer Home ❯ About the blog About the blog Jan 02, 2026 2 min read From time to time I just want to document an activity , insight or research result that does not belong any of the other categories. So I write a blog article about it. Possible other documentations are: My Projects is for bigger endeavors, usually documented on GitHub. My Diary has only short notes about each day in a year. Travel history about journeys, places I’ve been and people I’ve met. Leisure for shorter trips or good times with friends at nearby places. My Websites might actually have copies of the articles below. It sometimes depends where I start to write first, or if I translate an older German article to English. There is for example the website saiht.de/blog . The long term goal is to have hopefully one day one cohesive project made from a combination of a digital diary, blog, several To-do lists and a log file into. 2025 Quartz 4 and GitHub for notes with Obsidian Restart blogging with GitHub backup and Quartz v4 publishing. 2025-10-20 With WordPress to the rescue I tried a canvas of my new WordPress over Tethering install while waiting for my visa at the Vietnamese embassy. Competed in Saigon in the evening, FileZilla made it happen! Canvas is not supported by quartz, so it got removed. 2024 2024-12-19 Writing pages in Obsidian With a new daily note in Cambodia I started to fill my vault with a little linked content. 2024-11-21 A humble beginning 2024 is a new start with Obsidian. Graph View Table of Contents 2025 2024 Backlinks First use of Obsidian Official start of my study at Su Pham and Extension of a few projects saiht.de Digital Garden Created with Quartz v4.5.2 © 2026 GitHub Discord Community

Start of my third Sabbatical Obsidian Search Search Dark mode Light mode Reader mode !a.isFolder&&!b.isFolder||a.isFolder&&b.isFolder?a.displayName.localeCompare(b.displayName,void 0,{numeric:!0,sensitivity:\"base\"}):!a.isFolder&&b.isFolder?1:-1","filterFn":"node=>node.slugSegment!==\"tags\"","mapFn":"node=>node"}"> Explorer Home ❯ Blog ❯ 2020 ❯ 06 ❯ Start of my third Sabbatical Start of my third Sabbatical Aug 06, 2020 1 min read This Monday, June 8th, is not yet a day to rest. My solar project at the AISVN is not done yet, there are many things to connect. So I drive to the school in the morning and start soldering ESP32 controller boards to self-designed mainboards, and upload some test software. Documentation We have a website from the school that is still active, and has a history part: https://sites.google.com/ais.edu.vn/solar https://sites.google.com/ais.edu.vn/solar/history And of course it is documented on GitHub: https://kreier.github.io/solarmeter/ There is a dedicated site about this here in this vault: Graph View Backlinks Third Sabbatical Created with Quartz v4.5.2 © 2026 GitHub Discord Community
